job_description: You will be a member of the above group, which is responsible for:Transmission lines design work.The work includes development of project-specific design specifications, estimates; engineering analysis, design standard development, etc. Your job duties may include:Assist in developing and upgrading engineering software applicationsAssist engineers in developing designs and preparing related documentations This job will provide you with the following professional development:Programming techniques and experienceActual hands-on engineering design experienceLearning the development and application of new technologyExposure to specialized software for engineering applications
